title: Predicting Nature of Stocks Based on News Articles
excerpt: Predicted bullish/bearish effects of news on stock prices using LSTM and SVM

title: Generating Super-Resolution Images using GANs
excerpt: Generated super-resolved images using a combination of SRGAN and ESRGAN

excerpt: Created object data and keypoints to be reconstructed in 3D using Graph-CNN
